</simpleType> <simpleType name="PeriodType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="monthly"/> <enumeration value="one-time"/> <enumeration value="installation"/> <enumeration value="change"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="PresenceType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="required"/> <enumeration value="optional"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="Quantity"> <sequence> <element name="Units" type="string"/> <element name="Amount" type="decimal"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="TimePeriod"> <sequence> <element name="StartDateTime" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="EndDateTime" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="ValueType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="string"/> <enumeration value="long"/> <enumeration value="boolean"/> <enumeration value="dateTime"/> <enumeration value="decimal"/> <enumeration value="lkmsId"/> <enumeration value="mbit"/> <enumeration value="mb"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="sidId"> <restriction base="token"/> </simpleType> <element name="CallNumber" type="tns:CallNumber"/> </schema> <schema targetNamespace="http://cdm.a1telekom.at/common/error" version="0.1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:error="http://cdm.a1telekom.at/common/error"> <complexType name="ErrorDetailsType"> <sequence> <element name="ErrorCode" type="token"> <annotation> <documentation>Code of the error. Should consist of "prefix"-"code" (e.g. AAA-12345), where "prefix" is unique code of the service and "code" is code within the service</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="ErrorMessage" type="token"> <annotation> <documentation>Error-Message</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="SourceSystem" type="token" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>System where the error has its source. If in EAI, then "EAI"</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="ErrorDetails" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Optional Error Details</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="IsTechnical" type="boolean" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>1 .. technical error, 0 .. business error. Not present - unknown.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="Repeatable" type="boolean" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>1 .. execution repeatable, 0 .. non-repeatable. Not present - unknown.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="Additionals" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Additional Success/Error Messages</documentation> </annotation> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="Additional" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="Code" type="token"/> <element name="MessageTxt" type="token" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="ErrorDetails" type="error:ErrorDetailsType"/> </schema> <schema targetNamespace="http://eai.a1telekom.at/CustomerInventory" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:custinv="http://eai.a1telekom.at/CustomerInventory" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common="http://cdm.a1telekom.at/common"> <import namespace="http://cdm.a1telekom.at/common"/> <complexType name="ADXAccount"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:CustomerAccount"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="AllowanceProdOferPriceAlteration"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProdOfferPriceAlteration"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="AtomicProductSpecification" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductSpecification"> <sequence> <element name="CustomerFacingServiceSpec" type="custinv:CustomerFacingServiceSpec" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="BNAccount"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:CustomerAccount"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="BundledProdOfferOption" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="ProductOffering" type="custinv:ProductOffering"/> <element name="MinCardinality" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="MaxCardinality" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="DefaultCardinality" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="BundledProductOffering"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductOffering"> <sequence> <element name="BundledProdOfferOption" type="custinv:BundledProdOfferOption" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ComponentProdOfferPrice" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductOfferingPrice"> <sequence> <element name="PriceType" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Price" type="common:Money"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="CompositeProductSpecification"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductSpecification"> <sequence> <element name="ProductSpecification" type="custinv:ProductSpecification" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ConfigurableProductSpeCharacteristic"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductSpecCharacteristic"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="CustomerAccount" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="AccountNumber" type="xs:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="CustomerFacingServiceSpec" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ServiceSpecification"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="DiscountProdOferPriceAlteration"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProdOfferPriceAlteration"> <sequence> <element name="ProdOfferPriceChargeSidId" type="common:sidId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <annotation> <documentation>The charges that the alteration targets</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="DistributionChannel" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="FormattedAddress"> <sequence> <element name="AddressLine1"> <annotation> <documentation>LKMS: ADRESS_ZEILE_1 Description: 1. Zeile der postalischen Anschrift</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="xs:string"> <maxLength value="128"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="AddressLine2"> <annotation> <documentation>LKMS: ADRESS_ZEILE_2 Description: 2. Zeile der postalischen Anschrift</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="xs:string"> <maxLength value="128"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="AddressLine3"> <annotation> <documentation>LKMS: ADRESS_ZEILE_3 Description: 3. Zeile der postalischen Anschrift</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="xs:string"> <maxLength value="128"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="MarketSegment"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Modem"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:PhysicalResource"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="OneTimeChargeProdOfferPriceCharge" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProdOfferPriceCharge"> <sequence> <element name="TaxRate" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ChangeToProductOfferingSidId" type="common:sidId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <annotation> <documentation>This charge is valid if a change to the specifiedProductOffering is performed</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="PhysicalResource" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="serialNumber" type="xs:token" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="versionNumber" type="xs:token"/> <element name="installationDate" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="firmwareVersion" type="xs:token"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProdOfferPriceAlteration" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ComponentProdOfferPrice"> <sequence> <element name="ProdOfferPromotion" type="custinv:ProductPromotion" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ProdOfferPriceCharge" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ComponentProdOfferPrice"> <sequence> <element name="Period" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="Product" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Brand" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductStatus" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductSerialNumber" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="PhysicalResources" minOccurs="0"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="custinv:PhysicalResource" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="ProductCharacteristicValues" minOccurs="0"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="ProductCharacteristicValue" type="custinv:ProductCharacteristicValue" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductBundle"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:Product"> <sequence> <element name="BundledProducts" type="custinv:Product" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="BundledProductOfferingId" type="xs:token" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductCatalog" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductOffering" type="custinv:ProductOffering" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductCategory" abstract="true"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductSpecificationType"/> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductCharacteristicValue"> <sequence> <element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductSpecCharacteristic" type="custinv:ProductSpecCharacteristic"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductComponent"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:Product"> <sequence> <element name="SimpleProductOfferingId" type="xs:token" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductOffering" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="ProductOfferingId" type="custinv:ProductOfferingId"/> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductOfferingPrice" type="custinv:ProductOfferingPrice" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="DistributionChannel" type="custinv:DistributionChannel" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="ProductOfferingTerm" type="custinv:ProductOfferingTerm" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="ProductOfferingRelationship" type="custinv:ProductOfferingRelationship" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="MarketSegment" type="custinv:MarketSegment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductOfferingGroup"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:BundledProductOffering"> <sequence> <element name="MinChoices" default="1" type="xs:int"/> <element name="MaxChoices" default="1" type="xs:int"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <simpleType name="ProductOfferingId"> <restriction base="xs:token"/> </simpleType> <complexType name="ProductOfferingPrice" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductOfferingRelationship" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="TypeRelationship" type="xs:string"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <choice> <element name="DefaultCardinality" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="MaxCardinality" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="MinCardinality" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductOfferingGroup"> <annotation> <documentation>This Group includes several references to a productOffering, where only one of them must be applicable (OR-Relation)</documentation> </annotation> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="ProductOfferingId" type="common:sidId" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="ProductOfferingId" type="common:sidId"/> </choice> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductOfferingTerm"> <sequence> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="Type" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductPromotion" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="PromotionId" type="xs:string"/> <element name="PromotionName" type="xs:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductSpecCharacteristic"> <sequence> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ValueType" type="common:ValueType"/> <element name="Presence" type="common:PresenceType" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductSpecCharacteristicValue" type="custinv:ProductSpecCharacteristicValue" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="TranslateToServiceSpecCharacteristic" type="common:sidId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <annotation> <documentation>The SID IDs ServiceSpecCharacteristic</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductSpecCharacteristicValue" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="Value" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="InfluencedProductOfferingPrice" type="common:sidId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <annotation> <documentation>The SID IDs of prices that are influenced by this object</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ProductSpecification"> <sequence> <element name="ProductSpecificationId" type="custinv:ProductSpecificationId"/> <element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <element name="Description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ProductSpecCharacteristic" type="custinv:ProductSpecCharacteristic" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="productSpecificationType" type="custinv:ProductSpecificationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="ProductSpecificationId"> <restriction base="xs:token"/> </simpleType> type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ServiceSpecCharacteristicValue" type="custinv:ServiceSpecCharacteristicValue" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ServiceSpecCharacteristicValue" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ServiceSpecification" abstract="true"> <sequence> <element name="ValidFor" type="common:TimePeriod" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="ServiceSpecCharacteristic" type="custinv:ServiceSpecCharacteristic" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SimpleProductOffering"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductOffering"> <sequence> <element name="ProductSpecification" type="custinv:ProductSpecification"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="Subscription"> <sequence> <element name="Id" type="xs:token"/> <element name="CustomerAccount" type="custinv:CustomerAccount"/> <element name="Products" minOccurs="0"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="custinv:Product" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element ref="common:CallNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="AdoId" type="xs:token" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="LocationId" type="xs:token" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="FormattedAddress" type="custinv:FormattedAddress" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="Type" type="xs:token"> <annotation> <documentation>e.g. Wireline, Mobile, Mixed</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="VoiceProduct"> <complexContent> <extension base="custinv:ProductComponent"> <sequence> <element name="Type" type="xs:token"/> <element ref="common:CallNumber"/> <element name="UnlistedNumber" type="xs:boolean"/> </sequence> </extension> con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://eai.a1telekom.at/CustomerInventory" xmlns:com="http://cdm.a1telekom.at/common"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:getProductsForSubscriptionRequest> <cus:LoadOptions> <cus:GetResources>true</cus:GetResources> <cus:GetMobileNet>true</cus:GetMobileNet> <cus:GetFixedNet>true</cus:GetFixedNet> </cus:LoadOptions> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
<cus:SubscriptionId>899999997727713</cus:SubscriptionId>
</cus:getProductsForSubscriptionRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.con:request:

<cus:loadOptions> <cus:GetFixedNet>true</cus:GetFixedNet> <cus:GetMobileNet>true</cus:GetMobileNet> <cus:GetProducts>true</cus:GetProducts> </cus:loadOptions> </cus:getSubscriptionsForPartyRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: getProductsForSubscription
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://eai.a1telekom.at/CustomerInventory" xmlns:com="http://cdm.a1telekom.at/common"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:getProductsForSubscriptionRequest> <cus:LoadOptions> <cus:GetResources>?</cus:GetResources> <cus:GetMobileNet>?</cus:GetMobileNet> <cus:GetFixedNet>?</cus:GetFixedNet> </cus:LoadOptions> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <com:CallNumber> <CC>?</CC> <NDC>?</NDC> <SN>?</SN> </com:CallNumber> <cus:SubscriptionId>?</cus:SubscriptionId> </cus:getProductsForSubscriptionRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: getSubscriptionsForParty
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://eai.a1telekom.at/CustomerInventory"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:getSubscriptionsForPartyRequest> <cus:PartyId>?</cus:PartyId> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <cus:BAN>?</cus:BAN> <!--Optional:--> <cus:BNAccountId>?</cus:BNAccountId> <cus:loadOptions> <cus:GetFixedNet>?</cus:GetFixedNet> <cus:GetMobileNet>?</cus:GetMobileNet> <cus:GetProducts>?</cus:GetProducts> </cus:loadOptions> </cus:getSubscriptionsForPartyRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
